channel.title: Book Review on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Book Review on Incubyte Blog

item.title: Are you sabotaging your organizational goals?
item.description: I recently came across Simple Sabotage Field Manual. What struck me was you do not need bombs and explosives to start sabotaging. Many small actions that can cause delays, untidiness, and losses are also sabotage attempts. Do you see any parallels between the excerpts of the white paper and organizational behavior where you work?

item.title: Learnings From Clean Code
item.description: Robert Martin, fondly known as “Uncle Bob” in our community, is a software engineer and more famously an author and one of the founding fathers of Software Craftsmanship movement.
